snippet: In his first trip to Oman since the Syrian conflict began, the minister drew speculation that efforts to find ways to end the war have intensified.
abstract: Syria sends delegation led by Foreign Min Walid al-Moallem to Oman, raising possibility that diplomatic efforts to end Syrian war are being intensified; visit, which is made at invitation of Omanis, occurs amid reports that Pres Bashar al-Assad's forces are ceding ground militarily.
lead_paragraph: In his first trip to Oman since the Syrian conflict began, the minister drew speculation that efforts to find ways to end the war have intensified.

headline.main: Syrian Official’s Visit to Oman May Signal a Diplomatic Opening
headline.print_headline: Syrian Official’s Visit to Oman May Signal a Diplomatic Opening

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
